name: Origami (Haiyoooo)
description:
We're collecting playtest data on an early prototype!
This is a 2 player game. We aren't going to tell you anything besides controls!

  • Can you figure out what to do?
  • What do you think the shapes actually are?

Controls: PC + Keyboard

  • Player 1: WASD
  • Player 2: arrow keys

Controls: PC + Nitendo Switch Controllers

  • Collect to your device via Bluetooth
  • Each player uses one controller, horizontally

Tip

  • Play in full-screen mode to see the whole level
  • ESC key to reset the current level

Team

  • Zac Emerzian (@Zac E) - Level design, code
  • Eunice Lim (@Haiyoooo) - design, code
  • Bianka Kovacs - design, code
